column4: hi - when the update manager puts the icon in the notification area informing you of an update - is there a way to permanently ignore the suggested update?
yes go to autostarted applications and disable it there then in synaptic remove its optio
- i want the update manager - i just want the occassional option to ignore a particular update
the auto updater thing just tells you when there are updates I think. You can still ignore them, might have to check the settings to make sure its set like that though
